roleset.name: remove flower,beauty,innocence
roleset.note: DEFLOWER-V NOTES: Edited by hwangd (from deflower.01-v)

example.name: Transitive
example.text: The burning down of the house has deflowered the edifice palace of its beauty.
example.arg: The burning down of the house

example.name: Transitive
example.text: The burning down of the house has deflowered the beauty of his edifice palace.
example.arg: The burning down of the house
the beauty of his edifice palace
